FuncDef: The display fabric slot statistics command displays the numbers of cells received, sent, and discarded by each fabric component on a specified SFU.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When an SFU encounters packet loss, run the display fabric slot statistics command to check the numbers of cells received, sent, and discarded by each fabric component on the board. The command output helps determine whether packet loss occurs on some of the components, facilitating fault locating.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
